about_the_game: Love the music in Fat Chicken? Wish you could listen to it endlessly at your leisure? If so, you're in luck! From award-winning composer Jason Graves comes The Official Soundtrack for Fat Chicken. Fresh off his success with the latest Tomb Raider reboot and the Dead Space series, Jason has packed over 17 original tracks into a fun and catchy soundtrack for your listening pleasure.
detailed_description: Love the music in Fat Chicken? Wish you could listen to it endlessly at your leisure? If so, you're in luck!
